title: Border, 1795–1830
description: Consists of a floral band in thinly-printed pigment. Assorted flowers and foliage form a continuous frieze above a band of multi-colored leaf forms enclosed in curl brackets and dots. Reminiscent of India-chintz style patterns. Printed in pinks, blues, yellow, greens, black and white over a cream ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 1795–1830.
1795–1830. Block-printed on handmade paper. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1972-42-69.
